title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - EMERGENCY PODCAST: Anthony Joshua upset by Usyk
itunes:title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - EMERGENCY PODCAST: Anthony Joshua upset by Usyk
description:
Chris sits down with DAZN broadcaster and former boxer, Sergio Mora for an emergency reaction podcast. They break down Oleksandr Usyk beating Anthony Joshua to become a two-weight world champion with a unanimous decision win.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
